trans-unit.source: Thank you for your order at {shop_name}.
As our way of saying thanks, we want to give you a discount of [1]{amount}%[/1] off your next order! This offer is valid for [1]{days}[/1] days, so do not waste a moment!
trans-unit.target: 為表示我們對您惠顧的感謝，我們為您的下一個訂單提供了[1] {amount}％[/1] 的折扣！ 此優惠有效期為[1] {days} [/1] 天，千萬不要錯過機會！

trans-unit.source: You are one of our best customers and as such we want to thank you for your continued patronage.
trans-unit.target: 您是我們最好的客戶之一. 感謝您一直以來的惠顧。

trans-unit.source: As appreciation for your loyalty, we want to give you a discount of [1]{amount}%[/1] valid on your next order! This offer is valid for [1]{days}[/1] days, so do not waste a moment!
trans-unit.target: 為了感謝您的忠誠，我們為您的下一個訂單提供[1] {amount}％[/1] 的折扣！ 此優惠有效期為[1] {days} [/1] 天，千萬不要錯過機會！

trans-unit.source: Here is your coupon:

trans-unit.source: You are one of our best customers, however you have not placed an order in {days_threshold} days.

trans-unit.source: We wish to thank you for the trust you have placed in us and want to give you a discount of [1]{amount}%[/1] valid on your next order! This offer is valid for [1]{days}[/1] days, so do not waste a moment!
trans-unit.target: 我們想感謝您給予我們的信任，在我們店鋪下訂單，在此想藉這個機會我們給您的下一個訂單[1]{amount}％[/1] 的折扣！此優惠有效期為[1]{days}[/1] 天，所以不要浪費！

trans-unit.source: We wish to thank you for the trust you have placed in us and want to give you a discount of {amount}% valid on your next order! This offer is valid for {days} days, so do not waste a moment!
